Serialized Form

  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Class MorseCodeClient

      class MorseCodeClient extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • chatServer
          String chatServer
          String that is a host server for this Morse Code application
        • client
          Socket client
          Socket that is allows a connection to the server
        • displayArea
          JTextArea displayArea
          JTextArea where information is displayed to the user
        • enterField
          JTextField enterField
          JTextField where users enter information
        • input
          ObjectInputStream input
          ObjectInputStream that acts as an input stream from the server
        • message
          String message
          String that is a message from the server
        • output
          ObjectOutputStream output
          ObjectOutputStream that acts as an output stream to the server

    • Class MorseCodeServer

      class MorseCodeServer extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • clients
          MorseCodeServer.Communicator[] clients
          Array to manage connections for 2 clients
        • displayArea
          JTextArea displayArea
          JTextArea where information is displayed to the user

          ServerSocket server
          ServerSocket for server
        • threadPool
          ExecutorService threadPool
          Thread pool for managing client handlers
